gamerule.mob_explosion_griefing.enderman: Allow Endermen to pick up blocks
gamerule.mob_explosion_griefing.creeper_: Allow Creeper explosions to destroy blocks
gamerule.mob_explosion_griefing.ghast_gr: Allow Ghast Fireballs to destroy blocks and light fires
gamerule.mob_explosion_griefing.step_and: Allow certain mobs to pathfind to blocks (e.g. Turtle Eggs) in order to destroy them
